actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 96-66.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the printing of additional copies of The Geological Atlas of the U.S.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 96-66) Authorizes the printing, as a Senate document, of the field notebooks prepared by Herbert C. Hoover in connection with the Geological Atlas of the United States, Folio 31, Pyramid Peak Folio, California. Directs the printing of 3,500 additional copies for the use of the Senate.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the printing of additional copies of The Geological Atlas of the U.S.
